document.masterDocTitle: New additions to the leafhopper genus Salka Dworakowska (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae) from Hainan and Henan Provinces of China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New additions to the leafhopper genus Salka Dworakowska (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae) from Hainan and Henan Provinces of China

heading.emphasis:
Key to Chinese species of
Salka

paragraph.keyLead:
12 Aedeagal shaft with ventrolateral margins serrate distally
.................................................................................... Salka longihamata

- Aedeagal shaft with ventrolateral margins smooth distally ..........................................................................................
Salka songae

13 Aedeagal shaft with single apical process dorsally (
Fig. 13
) .......................................................................
Salka cambera
sp. nov.

14 Aedeagal shaft with processes arising from midlength, curved dorsad .......................................................................... ·
Salka zoza

21 Subgenital plate with lobelike process from inner margin, directed medially ....................................................
Salka jiangshiensis

25 Ventral part of aedeagal shaft with wedge-shaped extension medially .......................................................................... ·
Salka lobata

- Ventral part of aedeagal shaft without extension medially
............................................................................................ Salka abbotta

29 Apical processes of shaft longer than 1 / 2 total length of aedeagus
..................................................................... Salka jianfengensis

36 Aedeagal shaft with pair of triangular subapical extensions..........................................................................................
Salka xepima
